translation: Somewhere mature scholars held discourses on rhetorics;
Somewhere the art of swimming and Syntax were discussed.9.280.

gurmukhi: khUM bYT kY gwrVI gRMQ bwcY ]
translation: Somewhere Garuda Purna was being studied;
Somewhere the eulogies of Shiva were being composed in Prakrit;
Somewhere Greek, Arabic and language of heroic spirits was being learnt;
Somewhere Persian and new art of warfare were being studied.10.281.

gurmukhi: khUM ssqR kI Gwau ib`idAw bqYgo ]
translation: Somewhere someone was elucidating the treatment of weapon-wounds;

gurmukhi: khUM AsqR ko pwqkw pY clYgo ]
transliteration: Kahoon Astra Ko Paatkaa Pai Chalaigo||
translation: Somewhere the targets were being shot at with arms;

gurmukhi: khUM crm kI cwr ib`idAw bqwvY ]
translation: Somewhere the skilful use of the shield was being described;

gurmukhi: khUM bHm ib`idAw krY drb pwvY ]11]282]
transliteration: Kahoon Brahm Biddiaa Darai Darab Paavai||11||282||
translation: Somewhere someone was delivering discourse on Vedanta and receiving monetary award.11.282.

gurmukhi: khUM niRq ibidAw khUM nwd BydM ]
transliteration: Kahoon Nrit Bidiaa Kahoon Naad Bhedan||
translation: Somewhere the art of dancing and the mystery of sound was being described;
Somewhere discourses were being held on Puranas and Semitic texts;

gurmukhi: sBY A`Cr ibidAw sBY dys bwnI ]
transliteration: Sabhai Achchhar Bidiaa Sabhai Des Baanee||
translation: Somewhere alphabets and languages of various countries,Were being taugh;
Somewhere the significance was being attached to the worship practiced in various countries.12.283.
